io.spine.server.event

Interface EventDispatcherDelegate<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of entities subscribed to events
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommander, AggregatePartRepository, AggregateRepository

    @Internal
public interface EventDispatcherDelegate<I>
    A common interface for objects which need to dispatch events, but are unable to implement EventDispatcher.

    This interface defines own contract (instead of extending MessageDispatcher to allow classes that dispatch messages other than events (by implementing MessageDispatcher), and dispatch events by implementing this interface.

    See Also:
    DelegatingEventDispatcher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean dispatchesEvents()
      Verifies if this instance dispatches at least one domestic event.
      default boolean dispatchesExternalEvents()
      Verifies if this instance dispatches at least one external event.
      java.util.Set<I> dispatchEvent(io.spine.core.EventEnvelope envelope)
      Dispatches the event.
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getEventClasses()
      Obtains event classes dispatched by this delegate.
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getExternalEventClasses()
      Obtains external event classes dispatched by this delegate.
      default java.util.Set<java.lang.String> identity()
      Returns immutable set with one element with the identity of the multicast dispatcher that dispatches messages to itself.
      void onError(io.spine.core.EventEnvelope envelope, java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
      Handles an error occurred during event dispatching.

             java.lang.RuntimeException exception)

        Parameters:
        envelope - the event which caused the error
        exception - the error

      • identity

        default java.util.Set<java.lang.String> identity()
        Returns immutable set with one element with the identity of the multicast dispatcher that dispatches messages to itself.
        Returns:
        immutable set with the dispatcher delegate identity
        Implementation Note:
        The identity obtained as the result of EventDispatcherDelegate.toString().
